title: Brinjal Stir Fry | Vankaya vepudu ğŸ˜€
content:
Side dish: Eggplant Stir FryÂ  Servings: 4 Duration: 10 minsÂ  In andhra, Brinjal is the king of all vegetables itâ€™s a must Side Dish in occasions. Mostly you can see at traditional Indian weddings buffet or during festivals . It is very tender, delicious and easy recipe can make just in 10 minutes ğŸ˜¯ As everyoneâ€™s favorite I made it with generous amount of indian spice masala powder. Brinjal is also well known as Eggplant ğŸ†Â we call it as â€œvankayaâ€. I love this Stir Fry prepared with aromatic flavor of garlic Â and tremendous homemade masala powder. Brinjal should cook perfectly otherwise it becomes mushy and if Â happens, it spoils the texture of Eggplant. Do follow my Procedure and make an amazing side dish with Brinjal and enjoy with dal and piping hot rice ğŸšÂ with a dollop of ghee or you can have it with rice ğŸš. In Both ways it tastes great ğŸ‘ Letâ€™s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Vankayallu / Eggplants ğŸ†Â - 15 - chopped
  • Mustard seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Cumin seeds - 1 tsp
  • Curry leaves - 5
  • Salt - 1/4 tsp ( to cook Brinjal)
  • Coconut oil - 1 Tb sp ( if you wish, you can use regular cooking oil or butter )
Masala Powder:
  • Dry coconut pieces / desiccated coconut - 1/3 cup
  • Dry red chillies - 5 or red chilly flakes - 1 Tb sp
  • Red chilly Powder - 1/4 teaspoon
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Garlic cloves - 3
Procedure:
  • Add in oil, mustard and cumin seeds, curry leaves and chopped eggplants ğŸ†Â on medium heated pan
  • Saute 2 minutes and add 1/4 cup of water, salt 1/4 teaspoon, cook 5-7 minutes by covering with lid
  • After that, make masala powder into coarsely by adding in mixer
  • Then add masala powder on cooked Brinjal, gently mix and cover with lid
  • Let it cook for about 1-2 minutes on low heat, turn off heat and serve
  • Eggplant ğŸ†Â Stir Fry is ready to serve
  • Happy Cooking and Have a lovely day ğŸ™‚
